description.ko: 지구의 격동적인 역사가 식어가는 돌의 고요한 숨결 속에 한순간에 담겼습니다.
description.en: The violent history of the earth captured in a single, motionless breath of cooling stone.

prompt: A frozen volcanic eruption capturing the exact moment molten lava turns into jagged obsidian and basalt, with intricate cracks revealing iridescent geological strata of raw copper and gold. Detailed textures of parched soil, sediment layers, and cooling rock. 8k resolution, Unreal Engine 5. Global illumination highlights the rough organic textures and erosion patterns carved by time. The lighting mimics the golden hour, casting long, dramatic shadows that emphasize the topographical complexity of the cooling earth.
